Combining Items Research, Found Undiscovered Item!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance Archive (GameBoy Advance): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Combining Items Research, Found Undiscovered Item!
By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, September 25, 2002 - 04:49 pm:

I have been playing a lot over the past few days, trying to get all the items in my inventory and then combining them. Anyone interested might want to look at the last few threads in the Items section.

So far I have: completed all items descriptions in the Items data list, added a ton of compositions to the list, and added one new item I got through combining to the Items list. The item is a Wind Drum, which I made By combining a Megaphone and a Worm Fang. It's another durable item, which apparently boosts fear.

My new goal is to get some duplicate items so i can make the items which you can apparently only get through combining items, and see what they make in combinations.

By mepersoner on Thursday, September 26, 2002 - 01:01 pm:

Good job Lisa, keep up the good work.
